name: ContinuousLocking4Reputation
description: A scheme for continuous locking ERC20 Token for reputation.

eventDecorators.name: ExtendLocking
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: LockToken
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: Redeem
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: Release
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

parameterDecorators.name: _extendPeriod
parameterDecorators.description: the period to extend the locking. in batchTime.

parameterDecorators.name: _batchIndexToLockIn
parameterDecorators.description: index of the batch in which to start locking.

parameterDecorators.name: _lockingId
parameterDecorators.description: the locking id to extend.

functionDecorators.name: getLockingIdScore
functionDecorators.description: getLockingIdScore function return score of lockingId at specific bach index.

parameterDecorators.name: _batchIndex
parameterDecorators.description: batch index.

parameterDecorators.name: _lockingId
parameterDecorators.description: lockingId.

functionDecorators.name: getRepRewardPerBatch
functionDecorators.description: getRepRewardPerBatch function the calculation is done the following formula: RepReward = repRewardConstA * (repRewardConstB**_batchIndex).

parameterDecorators.name: _batchIndex
parameterDecorators.description: the index of the batch to calc rep reward of.

parameterDecorators.name: _avatar
parameterDecorators.description: the avatar to mint reputation from.

parameterDecorators.name: _reputationReward
parameterDecorators.description: the total amount of reputation that can be minted by this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _startTime
parameterDecorators.description: locking period start time, in seconds since epoch.

parameterDecorators.name: _batchTime
parameterDecorators.description: batch time (in seconds).

parameterDecorators.name: _redeemEnableTime
parameterDecorators.description: redeem enable time, in seconds since epoch redeem reputation can be done after this time.

parameterDecorators.name: _maxLockingBatches
parameterDecorators.description: - maximum number of locking batches that a user can lock (or extend) her tokens for.

parameterDecorators.name: _repRewardConstA
parameterDecorators.description: - the total amount of reputation allocation per batch is calculated by : _repRewardConstA * ((_repRewardConstB/1000) ** batchIndex).

parameterDecorators.name: _repRewardConstB
parameterDecorators.description: - the total amount of reputation allocation per batch is calculated by : _repRewardConstA * ((_repRewardConstB/1000) ** batchIndex). _repRewardConstB must be < 1000.

parameterDecorators.name: _batchesIndexCap
parameterDecorators.description: the length of the locking period (in batches). This value capped by BATCHES_HARDCAP .

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: the locking token.

parameterDecorators.name: _agreementHash
parameterDecorators.description: is a hash of agreement required to be added to the TX by participants.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of token to lock.

parameterDecorators.name: _period
parameterDecorators.description: the number of batches that the tokens will be locked for.

parameterDecorators.name: _batchIndexToLockIn
parameterDecorators.description: the batch index in which the locking period starts. Must be the currently active batch.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: the beneficiary to redeem.

parameterDecorators.name: _lockingId
parameterDecorators.description: the lockingId to redeem from.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: the beneficiary for the release.

parameterDecorators.name: _lockingId
parameterDecorators.description: the locking id to release.
